attributes.action: TAKE STEPS TO ENSURE THE PARTY PAYS FOR PHILIP HAMMONDS 80 DAY JOLLY AROUND THE EU
attributes.additional_details: Philip HAMMONDS recently revealed mission to visit every EU leader to garner support is BLATANTLY party political and nothing to do with the governance of the country.  It is ILLEGAL to use taxpayer pounds for party political benefit so the Conservative Party MUST be required to pay the FULL cost of travel and accommodation incurred in the journeys.
